pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium III
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8.1 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports Midi
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3090
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one?
  • Additional Notes: None of these are necessary for this game it will run on pretty much anything, so far as we know
